content: *includes instructions on how to make pom-poms lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 724 *chs-pomhat pdf* skill level beginner level 1 homespun® article #790 1 ball *deco* crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm worked from the top down in the round earflaps are worked in row use long chain on each earflap to attach pom-pom shown with cable-knit pullover sweater #723 1 *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cable-knit-pullover-sweater
